facts.fact_content: Goldman Sachs predicts gold prices will reach $2,300 by 2025.
Bank of America analysts predict gold prices may test $2,500 if inflation stays high and the Fed pauses rate hikes.
Citigroup analysts predict gold will remain near $2,200 unless something big happens.
Gold could rise to as much as $3,880 a troy ounce in the event of a recession.
Global gold ETF holdings are worth about 1% of outstanding US Treasuries.
